text: Ezɨ Juda kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazir ekiam, e nɨ mɨkɨmamin mɨgɨrɨgɨaba puvatɨ. E kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, e bizitam pazava a gamizir puvatɨ. God en arazir kuram akagha gɨfa. Ezɨ gumazir ekiam, gumazir nɨn kap inizir kam, a uabɨra nɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn ikian kogham. Bar puvatɨ. E bar moghɨra.”
